publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1915# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: St John’s Hospital, Livingston—That the Parliament believes that the emergency and major general surgery services in operation at St John’s Hospital, Livingston, until 27 September 2004 should be restored with all possible speed and certainly as soon as possible. Supported by: Phil Gallie*

S2M-1915# Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: St John’s Hospital, Livingston—That the Parliament believes that the emergency and major general surgery services in operation at St John’s Hospital, Livingston, until 27 September 2004 should be restored with all possible speed and certainly as soon as possible. Supported by: Phil Gallie
S2M-1915# St John’s Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) Murdo Fraser*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Colin Fox*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Mr David Davidson*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-1915# St John’s Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) Bill Aitken*, Carolyn Leckie*, Frances Curran*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-1915# St John’s Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) Mary Scanlon*
S2M-1915# St John’s Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-1915# St John's Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) John Scott*
S2M-1915# St John’s Hospital, Livingston (lodged on 28 October 2004) Robin Harper*
